title: Marry Me Again
overview: To save her late fiance Tang Jingxing's struggling Chinese jewelry brand, Mi Chuxia teams up with celebrity influencer Lu Yi. As they work together to revive the company, sparks of romance begin to fly. But when Chuxia discovers Lu Yi's true identity as Tang Jingxing himself, she must confront the shocking truth behind his presumed death in a car crash three years earlier.
